TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract UCOMITypeComp

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the `ITypeComp` interface, see the MSDN Library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Bind (string szName, int lHashVal, short wFlags, out System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeInfo ppTInfo, out System.Runtime.InteropServices.DESCKIND pDescKind, out System.Runtime.InteropServices.BINDPTR pBindPtr);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Bind(string szName, int32 lHashVal, int16 wFlags, class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeInfo ppTInfo, valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.DESCKIND pDescKind, valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.BINDPTR pBindPtr) cil managed

Docs.param: A hash value for computed by `LHashValOfNameSys`.
A flags word containing one or more of the invoke flags defined in the `INVOKEKIND` enumeration.
On successful return, a reference to the type description that contains the item to which it is bound, if a `FUNCDESC` or `VARDESC` was returned.
A reference to a `DESCKIND` enumerator that indicates whether the name bound to is a `VARDESC`, `FUNCDESC`, or `TYPECOMP`.
A reference to the bound-to `VARDESC`, `FUNCDESC`, or `ITypeComp` interface.
Docs.summary: Maps a name to a member of a type, or binds global variables and functions contained in a type library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `ITypeComp::Bind` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void BindType (string szName, int lHashVal, out System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeInfo ppTInfo, out System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeComp ppTComp);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void BindType(string szName, int32 lHashVal, class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeInfo ppTInfo, class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeComp ppTComp) cil managed

Docs.param: A hash value for determined by `LHashValOfNameSys`.
On successful return, a reference to an `ITypeInfo` of the type to which was bound.
On successful return, a reference to an `ITypeComp` variable.
Docs.summary: Binds to the type descriptions contained within a type library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `ITypeComp::BindType` in the MSDN library.
